trans-unit.source: Represents a control that acts as a container for a group of controls within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示充当一组内的控件的容器的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The View control is a container for a group of controls.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#introduction) - [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax) # # 简介视图控件是一组控件的容器。

trans-unit.source: A View control must always be contained within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: 视图控件必须始终包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Only one View control at a time can be defined as the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: 一次只有一个视图控件可以定义为中的活动视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property specifies the active View control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性指定在活动视图控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The active view control is rendered to the client, as long as the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is visible.
trans-unit.target: 活动视图控件呈现给客户端，只要包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件是否可见。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A> property to determine whether a View control and its child controls are visible on the page and rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A>属性以确定视图控件及其子控件是否在页上可见和呈现给客户端。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: A View control can contain controls of any type, including other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controls.
trans-unit.target: 视图控件可以包含的任何类型，包括其他控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: A View control does not support any style properties.
trans-unit.target: 视图控件不支持任何样式属性。

trans-unit.source: To apply styles to a View control, add one or more <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controls to the View control.
trans-unit.target: 若要将样式应用到的视图控件，添加一个或多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>视图控件的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The View class provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> events.
trans-unit.target: 视图类提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised when the current View control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>当前视图控件变为活动视图时引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different View control.
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性更改或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>调用方法来指定不同的视图控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised for `View2` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised for `View1`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`View1`是中的活动视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性更改，以指定`View2`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>为引发事件`View2`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>为引发事件`View1`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To allow users to navigate between multiple View controls within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control to each View control.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许用户中的多个视图控件之间进行导航<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件，你可以添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>于每个视图控件的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control's `CommandName` property to the ID of the View control to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件的`CommandName`属性要导航到视图控件的 ID。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information on manipulating View controls within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息操作中的视图控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控制，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>主题。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # 声明性语法``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: 发生时当前<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref>控件变为活动视图。

trans-unit.source: The Activate event is raised when the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: 将引发激活事件时当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件变为活动视图。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性更改或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>调用方法来指定不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the Activate event is raised for `View2` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised for `View1`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`View1`是中的活动视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性更改，以指定`View2`，发生激活事件`View2`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>为引发事件`View1`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current active <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的当前活动<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref>控件变为非活动状态。

trans-unit.source: The Deactivate event is raised when the current active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: 停用事件引发时的当前活动<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件变为非活动状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>时，控件变为非活动状态的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性更改或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>调用方法来指定不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the Deactivate event is raised for `View1` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised for `View2`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`View1`是中的活动视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>属性更改，以指定`View2`，为引发停用事件`View1`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>为引发事件`View2`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将主题应用到该控件。

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property indicates whether themes are enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: EnableTheming 属性指示是否为启用主题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 是否为中包含的控件启用主题 EnableTheming 属性还会影响其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply.
trans-unit.target: 当 EnableTheming 属性是`true`，应用程序的主题目录中搜索要应用的控件外观。

trans-unit.source: If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果用于特定的控件中的主题目录存在，则不会应用的外观。

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property are not used.
trans-unit.target: 当 EnableTheming 属性是`false`，则不搜索主题目录和内容<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>不使用属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>

trans-unit.source: A control can override the EnableTheming value set by its parent control, or by the containing page.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以重写通过设置其父控件，或包含的页的 EnableTheming 值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control has EnableTheming set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls contained within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> property to `true` on the individual child controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件具有设置为 EnableTheming `false`，您可以有选择地应用于子控件中包含的主题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A>属性`true`各个子控件上。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use themes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使用主题;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised when the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>引发事件时当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件变为活动视图。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised when the current active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>引发事件时的当前活动<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件变为非活动状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref>控件是否可见。

trans-unit.source: Use the Visible property to determine whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is visible and rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: Visible 属性用于确定是否当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件是否可见以及呈现给客户端。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to be visible on the rendered page, it must be the active view in its containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, and the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control must be visible.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制要在呈现的页面上显示，它必须是中其包含的活动视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件，并包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件必须可见。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is not visible on the page, or if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is not the active view, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control and its child controls are not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件不可见的页上，或者如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件不活动的视图，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件及其子控件不会呈现。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Visible property is set internally based on the visibility and active view for the containing parent control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> Visible 属性设置内部根据的可见性和包含的父控件的活动视图。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property at run time, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时，设置此属性<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发异常。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Visible property at design time, any changes to the property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果在设计时设置的可见属性，将忽略对属性的任何更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref>控件是可见的; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property at run time.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在运行时设置此属性。
